languages.text: "Ох... признаться, новость о ее аресте меня поразила до глубины души... Мне позволено говорить откровенно? Признаться, я и слова дурного не могу сказать о губернаторе Вьятт, и надеюсь, что, когда вы оцените ее усилия, ваш гнев сменится милостью".

"Oh... I must confess, the news of her arrest has shaken me to my core... May I speak openly? I admit that I haven't got a bad word to say about Governor Vyatt, and I hope that when you appraise her efforts, your anger will change to mercy."
languages.original_text: "Ох... признаться, новость о ее аресте меня поразила до глубины души... Мне позволено говорить откровенно? Признаться, я и слова дурного не могу сказать о губернаторе Вьятт, и надеюсь, что, когда вы оцените ее усилия, ваш гнев сменится милостью".

traits.locale_text: "Oh... I must confess, the news of her arrest has shaken me to my core... May I speak openly? I admit that I haven't got a bad word to say about Governor Vyatt, and I hope that when you appraise her efforts, your anger will change to mercy."

"Oh... I must confess, the news of her arrest has shaken me to my core... May I speak openly? I admit that I haven't got a bad word to say about Governor Vyatt, and I hope that when you appraise her efforts, your anger will change to mercy."

"Oh... I must confess, the news of her arrest has shaken me to my core... May I speak openly? I admit that I haven't got a bad word to say about Governor Vyatt, and I hope that when you appraise her efforts, your anger will change to mercy."

"Oh... I must confess, the news of her arrest has shaken me to my core... May I speak openly? I admit that I haven't got a bad word to say about Governor Vyatt, and I hope that when you appraise her efforts, your anger will change to mercy."

languages.text: “噢……我必须承认，她被捕的消息让我感到震惊……我可以实话实说吗？我得承认，我对维亚特总督没有一句怨言。希望您评价她的付出时，您能平息您的怒火，怜悯地对待她。”
languages.original_text: "Oh... I must confess, the news of her arrest has shaken me to my core... May I speak openly? I admit that I haven't got a bad word to say about Governor Vyatt, and I hope that when you appraise her efforts, your anger will change to mercy."

traits.locale_text: “噢……我必须承认，她被捕的消息让我感到震惊……我可以实话实说吗？我得承认，我对维亚特总督没有一句怨言。希望您评价她的付出时，您能平息您的怒火，怜悯地对待她。”

languages.text: «Oh... Debo confesar que las nuevas de su arresto me han alterado profundamente... ¿Puedo hablar con franqueza? No tengo nada malo que decir sobre la gobernadora Vyatt, y espero que, cuando evalúe sus contribuciones, su ira pueda convertirse en piedad».
languages.original_text: "Oh... I must confess, the news of her arrest has shaken me to my core... May I speak openly? I admit that I haven't got a bad word to say about Governor Vyatt, and I hope that when you appraise her efforts, your anger will change to mercy."

traits.locale_text: «Oh... Debo confesar que las nuevas de su arresto me han alterado profundamente... ¿Puedo hablar con franqueza? No tengo nada malo que decir sobre la gobernadora Vyatt, y espero que, cuando evalúe sus contribuciones, su ira pueda convertirse en piedad».

languages.text: 「ああ…白状しますと、総督が逮捕されたと聞いて心底震え上がっています…率直に申し上げてもよろしいでしょうか？私はビャット総督を悪く言える立場にはありませんので、総督の働きを認め、陛下の怒りをお慈悲に換えてはいただけないでしょうか」
languages.original_text: "Oh... I must confess, the news of her arrest has shaken me to my core... May I speak openly? I admit that I haven't got a bad word to say about Governor Vyatt, and I hope that when you appraise her efforts, your anger will change to mercy."

traits.locale_text: 「ああ…白状しますと、総督が逮捕されたと聞いて心底震え上がっています…率直に申し上げてもよろしいでしょうか？私はビャット総督を悪く言える立場にはありませんので、総督の働きを認め、陛下の怒りをお慈悲に換えてはいただけないでしょうか」

languages.text: "Oh ... ich muss gestehen, die Nachricht von ihrer Verhaftung hat mich bis ins Mark erschüttert ... Darf ich offen sprechen? Ich kann über Gouverneurin Vyatt kein schlechtes Wort sagen, und wenn Ihr ihre Bemühungen bewertet, wird sich Eure Wut hoffentlich in Gnade verwandeln."
languages.original_text: "Oh... I must confess, the news of her arrest has shaken me to my core... May I speak openly? I admit that I haven't got a bad word to say about Governor Vyatt, and I hope that when you appraise her efforts, your anger will change to mercy."

traits.locale_text: "Oh ... ich muss gestehen, die Nachricht von ihrer Verhaftung hat mich bis ins Mark erschüttert ... Darf ich offen sprechen? Ich kann über Gouverneurin Vyatt kein schlechtes Wort sagen, und wenn Ihr ihre Bemühungen bewertet, wird sich Eure Wut hoffentlich in Gnade verwandeln."

languages.text: « Oh... Je dois avouer que j'ai été profondément secoué en apprenant qu'on l'avait arrêtée... Puis-je parler franchement ? J'admets que je n'ai rien de mauvais à dire au sujet de la gouverneure Vyatt, et j'espère que votre colère laissera place à la clémence lorsque vous évaluerez ses efforts. »
languages.original_text: "Oh... I must confess, the news of her arrest has shaken me to my core... May I speak openly? I admit that I haven't got a bad word to say about Governor Vyatt, and I hope that when you appraise her efforts, your anger will change to mercy."

traits.locale_text: « Oh... Je dois avouer que j'ai été profondément secoué en apprenant qu'on l'avait arrêtée... Puis-je parler franchement ? J'admets que je n'ai rien de mauvais à dire au sujet de la gouverneure Vyatt, et j'espère que votre colère laissera place à la clémence lorsque vous évaluerez ses efforts. »

languages.text: "Ah... Doğrusu, tutuklandığı haberi beni derinden sarstı. İzninizle açık konuşabilir miyim? Vali Vyatt hakkında söyleyecek kötü bir sözüm olmadığı doğrudur, yaptıklarını değerlendirirken öfkenizin merhamete dönüşeceğini umuyorum."
languages.original_text: "Oh... I must confess, the news of her arrest has shaken me to my core... May I speak openly? I admit that I haven't got a bad word to say about Governor Vyatt, and I hope that when you appraise her efforts, your anger will change to mercy."

traits.locale_text: "Ah... Doğrusu, tutuklandığı haberi beni derinden sarstı. İzninizle açık konuşabilir miyim? Vali Vyatt hakkında söyleyecek kötü bir sözüm olmadığı doğrudur, yaptıklarını değerlendirirken öfkenizin merhamete dönüşeceğini umuyorum."
